item.title: Global Error Handling in ASP.NET Core: From Middleware to Modern Handlers
item.description: Learn How to handle errors globally in ASP.NET Core using middleware, IProblemDetailsService, and the new IExceptionHandler in .NET 8. This week's issue walks you through pragmatic approaches to error handling, with real-world tips for validation, chaining, and observability. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/global-error-handling-in-aspnetcore-from-middleware-to-modern-handlers
